name: Polytheism
uniques: Comment [Enables you to build Shrines and its equivalents, a low cost 'Worship Place' that produces culture in addition to faith]

uniques: [+1 Gold] [in all cities connected to capital]
[+25]% Production when constructing [Military] units [in all cities] <in cities with a [Shrine]>
[+50]% Production when constructing [Intergration] buildings [in annexed cities]

name: Monotheism
uniques: Comment [Enables you to build Chapels, a low cost 'Worship Place' that produces faith exclusively]

uniques: [+1 Gold, +1 Faith] per [3] population [in holy cities]

uniques: [25]% of excess happiness converted to [Culture] <after adopting [Expanded Mythology]>

uniques: [+1 Happiness] [in all cities connected to capital]

uniques: [+15]% Production when constructing ['Infrastructure'] buildings [in all cities]
